Summary: It was exactly like Bentwaters England. a close up with a slow U.F.O.
divs: sighting detailsit was october of 1996. i was in the sixth grade and had been voted king of my class for harvest festival. me and a guy who really is the meaning of hillbilly. {terrible witness!!}. were outside of my house as it had just turned dark. we had went to my mothers mustang to eat some cupcakes i could'nt sell at school.{trying to raise money for my school.} when i noticed a red ball of light in the distance, i immediately thought it was a cellular tower, because they had just started setting those up out here. but my thoughts quickly changed when the light started to come in our direction. i told my ex-friend. "hey man look at this [pd\tg]." he got out of the car and then we both witnessed a small red ball of light that was not pulsing or anything just glowing. it was less than a football field away from us and very low to the ground. {just above the powerlines.} it come toward us and then stopped and sat there for about 30 seconds. then it took a left and slowly disappeared behind the trees. and i am very serious when i say i felt like i was being watched!! i was pretty sick to my stomach. we went inside my house quickly, and told my mother, and i've loved aliens and u.f.o.'s ever since.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Woodland
This sighting has never been favorited.
